features.name: Rage
features.description: Gain advantage on Strength checks and saves, plus bonus damage.

features.name: Reckless Attack
features.description: Gain advantage on melee attacks using Strength on your turn.

features.name: Bardic Inspiration
features.description: Give an inspiration die to an ally within 60 feet.

features.name: Jack of All Trades
features.description: Add half proficiency bonus to ability checks not already proficient.
